actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider switching logic to automatically failover when a provider is unhealthy. This improves reliability and user experience during provider outages.
implementation_steps: Create a utility module for circuit breaker logic (track failures, open/close state).
Integrate circuit breaker checks into provider request flow.
Add basic logging for circuit breaker state transitions.
Test failover by simulating provider errors.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming request and propagate it through backend services for improved traceability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Implement middleware to generate and attach correlation IDs to requests.
Ensure correlation ID is included in logs and passed to downstream services.
Update test cases to verify correlation ID propagation.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage for Provider Switching
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for provider switching and telemetry endpoints to ensure robust failover and metric collection.
implementation_steps: Add new test cases for edge scenarios (provider failure, latency spikes).
Mock provider responses to simulate errors and verify failover.
Validate telemetry metrics are correctly updated.

actionable_tasks.title: Frontend: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the Spotify OAuth login flow and UI, ensuring users can authenticate and connect their accounts seamlessly.
implementation_steps: Implement missing UI elements for Spotify login.
Wire up OAuth callback handling and error states.

actionable_tasks.title: Frontend: Add Mode Selection to EnhancedMusicDiscovery
actionable_tasks.description: Implement UI controls for selecting music discovery modes (smart, mood, trending, social, AI radio) in the EnhancedMusicDiscovery component.
implementation_steps: Add dropdown or button group for mode selection.
Wire up mode selection to backend API calls.
Display selected mode and update recommendations accordingly.
